Package com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop.annotation

Provides the annotations which back the Infinitum AOP framework.

See:
          Description

Annotation Types Summary
After Indicates that the annotated advice is to be executed after a JoinPoint completes.
Around Indicates that the annotated advice is to be executed around a JoinPoint.
Aspect Separates cross-cutting concerns from core application code by providing pointcut advice.
Before Indicates that the annotated advice is to be executed before a JoinPoint is invoked.
 

Package com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop.annotation Description

Provides the annotations which back the Infinitum AOP framework.
